card_info.title: Human Brains
card_info.desc: This is a small blurb about the band The Human Brains. I know they have an album, that's pretty neat. Dad if you see this, Tell me what else to put here

card_info.title: Father
card_info.desc: This is a tid bit about the band Father. My dad was in this one too, get it, my father was in Father!!

card_info.title: Johnny Frisbee
card_info.desc: This is a little somethin about the band Johnny Frisbee. This one has my favorite name. I think the backstory is something about their baseball sponsor, and a local laundromat possibly? Maybe you'll find out at some point.
